title: No Traditional Exams - Project-Based Assessment
description: This course (BC3707-LLMs-Foundations-and-Ethics) does not appear to have traditional midterm or final exams. Instead, the course uses project-based assessment with specific deadlines: Project proposal due February 25 (5%), Project midterm report due April 1 (20%), Final presentation on April 29 or May 4 (10%), and Final report due May 10 (25%). The course also includes paper discussion presentations (30%) and class participation (10%).
